Advozse: Advozse, eh? Tongue slicker than a greased airlock. Just don't try sellin' me my own ship, ya silver-mouthed bilge rat.
Aleena: An Aleena? Hah! Small as a ration tin and twice as jumpy. If you go missin', I'll check under the bunk.
Aqualish: Aqualish. Cantina-fight legends and bad attitudes wrapped in meat. Seen your kind lose arms and still start swingin'.
Arkanian: An Arkanian… cold eyes, colder morals. I've seen your 'science' turn folk into spare parts.
Arkanian Offshoot: Offshoot, huh? Not pure enough for your masters, not lucky enough to escape 'em. Galaxy's cruel that way.
Balosar: Balosar? Stand too close and my lungs start screamin'. Keep that toxic breath pointed away from the helm, spacer.
Barabel: Barabel. All teeth and bad intentions. You look like a walking medical expense.
Bith: A Bith! Smart as a navicomputer and about as sturdy as a cracked datapad. Don't trip.
Blood Carver: Blood Carver… kriff me sideways, even your *name* sounds like a war crime.
Bothan: Bothan, eh? Spies, whispers, and dead heroes. Every time your kind helps the galaxy, half of you don't make it back.
Caamasi: A Caamasi. Soft voice in a hard void. Galaxy chews gentle folk like stim gum.
Cathar: Cathar claws aboard. Scratch the hull and I'll scratch you back—harder.
Celegian: A Celegian? Floatin' brain in a fishbowl. Brilliant thinker, useless in a bar fight.
Cerean: Cerean. Two brains and still takes too long to pull the trigger. Don't overthink dying.
Chagrian: Chagrian. Built for deep water and deeper trouble. Seen worse, smelled better.
Chiss: A Chiss. Blue skin, red eyes, plans within plans. Bet you already know how this ends.
Chistori: Chistori muscle. When negotiations fail, you start speakin' in broken bones.
Clawdite: A Clawdite shapeshifter? Great. Now I gotta wonder which of you is real—and which owes me money.
Codru-Ji: Codru-Ji. Four legs, stubborn skull. You'll block a hallway just by existin'.
Dathomirian: Dathomirian… witches, warlords, and bad vibes. Force clings to you like rot.
Dashade: Dashade. Force tricks bounce off you like cheap blaster fire. Jedi hate that—and so do healers.
Defel: Defel in the shadows. If something disappears, I ain't askin' questions—I'm just lockin' doors.
Draethos: Draethos. Thick hide, thicker head. You'll survive longer than most, whether you want to or not.
Dug: A Dug! Upside-down legs and right-side-up problems. Try not to trip over reality.
Duros: Ah, a Duros. Born in the cockpit, died in the void—or lived long enough to fly my ship. Don't crash it.
Elomin: Elomin, eh? Brains like a navcore, bones like cheap glass. Don't lean too hard on the bulkhead.
Ewok: An Ewok? Hah! Fuzzy little murder machines. I've seen your kind drop stormtroopers with rocks and bad intentions.
Falleen: Falleen… walkin' pheromone cloud. If folk start actin' stupid around you, I'm airlockin' someone.
Felucian: Felucian. Jungle-born and Force-soaked. That planet eats ships for breakfast, so you're already suspicious.
Feeorin: Feeorin. Big horns, loud mouth, and zero sense of personal space. You enter a room like a bar fight.
Fosh: A Fosh! Cute smile, sharp knives. I don't trust anything that small with that much confidence.
Gand: A Gand. No-name stalker from the void. If you start trackin' me, I'm shootin' first.
Gamorrean: Gamorrean. Muscle-bound pig with a grudge against doors. You swing first and ask questions never.
Gen'Dai: Gen'Dai… stars help us. I've seen your kind keep fightin' after bits fell off that should've stayed attached.
Geonosian: A Geonosian. Built droid armies, started wars, then got glassed for it. Hive minds ain't always smart.
Givin: Givin. Numbers whisper to you like ghosts. Shame people don't.
Gotal: A Gotal? Feels emotions through the void. Bet cantinas feel like gettin' punched in the head.
Gran: Gran. Three eyes and still misses the point. I've lost credits to your kind more than once.
Gungan: A Gungan! Galaxy laughed… right up until your shields held and the blasters didn't.
Herglic: Herglic. Built like a bulk freighter and just as hard to move. Don't lean on the railin'.
Houk: A Houk. Four arms, short fuse. You look like a bad day for anything bolted down.
Human: A Human? Kriff me. Everywhere, always in charge, always surprised when it all goes wrong. Empires, Rebellions, Sith, Jedi—every galaxy-sized mess somehow traces back to you lot. No offense, spacer—but I've seen Humans rule the stars, burn 'em down, then ask why it hurts. Adaptable, sure. Responsible? Not a chance.
Hutt: A Hutt… stars above. Crime lords, slug bellies, and deals that crawl slower than you do. Don't slime the deck.
Iktotchi: Iktotchi. Sees trouble comin' and walks into it anyway. Bold strategy.
Ithorian: An Ithorian. Gentle souls with voices that can shake a ship apart. Clear your throat *outside*.
Jawa: A Jawa? Hide your tools, your credits, and your kriffin' socks. If the ship's still flyin' tomorrow, I'll be impressed.
Kaleesh: Kaleesh. Masked war-dog with a bone-deep grudge. General Grievous made sure the galaxy flinches when it sees you.
Kaminoan: A Kaminoan… tall drink o' rainwater who cloned half the galaxy and still couldn't make one with a sense of humor. No hard feelings—just decades of war.
Kel Dor: Kel Dor. Masked Jedi, calm minds. Plo Koon made your kind look heroic—high bar to clear.
Kerkoiden: Kerkoiden. Marches like there's still an officer watchin'. Bet you sleep at attention.
Khil: A Khil. Force in the blood and bad luck in the stars. Galaxy's never gentle with your kind.
Kissai: Kissai. Sith priests and ancient rot. If you start chantin', I'm jettisonin' the cargo—and you.
Klatooinian: Klatooinian. Spent so long workin' for Hutts you forgot how to say 'no'. Don't worry—neither did they.
Lannik: A Lannik. Short, solid, and stubborn as a sealed hatch. Pushing you is a waste of fuel.
Lurmen: Lurmen. Peaceful folk who survived wars by hidin'. Can't say I blame you—void's a nasty place.
Mantellian Savrip: Mantellian Savrip? Big, ugly, and born angry. Corellians tell bedtime stories about not meetin' you.
Massassi: Massassi… Sith shock troops from the bad old days. History remembers your fists more than your brains.
Miraluka: A Miraluka. Blind eyes, Force sight. Jedi got nervous around your kind—said you saw what they were tryin' to hide.
Mon Calamari: A Mon Calamari. Shipbuilders, admirals, and freedom fighters. You'll save the ship—then cry about it.
Mrlssi: Mrlssi. Credits whisper to you sweeter than any siren song. I've lost ships to smiles like yours.
Nagai: A Nagai. Cold worlds, colder wars. Empire tried breakin' you once—didn't stick.
Nautolan: Nautolan. Those head-tendrils start twitchin', I know danger's close. Jedi Quinlan Vos made your kind famous for that.
Nelvaanian: Nelvaanian. Half myth, half nightmare. Clone troopers still wake up sweatin' over your homeworld.
Neimoidian: Neimoidian. Trade Federations, blockades, and galaxy-wide bad decisions. Funny how that worked out.
Noghri: A Noghri. Vader's knife in the dark. Loyal to a fault—and that fault's usually fatal.
Nosaurian: Nosaurian. Tail strong enough to clear a room. Dockmasters hate seein' you walk in.
Nyriaanan: Nyriaanan. Winged folk who don't fear a long fall. Gravity's just another enemy to outrun.
Quarren: A Quarren. Always pickin' the wrong side, then complainin' when it sinks. Seen that story before.
Rakata: Rakata… ancient empire builders who bent the Force till it snapped back. Galaxy's still payin' for it.
Replica Droid: Replica Droid? Looks alive, thinks metal. I've argued with worse—usually cheaper.
Rodian: A Rodian. Bounty hunters, quick shots, and loud mistakes. Greedo really did your reputation no favors.
Ryn: A Ryn. Wandering traders with music in their bones. I've seen your kind steal hearts and wallets in one song.
Sakiyan: Sakiyan. Sky hunters who treat gravity like a suggestion. Try not to test it indoors.
Selkath: Selkath. Smug, neutral, and hidin' behind laws thicker than a hull plate. Manaan taught the galaxy that 'peaceful' don't mean 'kind.'
Shard: A Shard… crystal thinker bolted into a droid shell. I've scraped ice with more warmth.
Snivvian: Snivvian. Nervous eyes and twitchy hands. You look like you plan your escape before you enter the room.
Sullustan: Sullustan. Sharp-eyed spacers who don't miss much. Nien Nunb proved your kind flies best when things go sideways.
Taung: Taung. Old warriors, older grudges. Mandalorians stole your thunder and you never got it back.
Talz: Talz. Built for frozen hellholes and ugly fights. Clone troopers still curse your snow.
Thakwaash: Thakwaash. Two brains, one bad idea. Hope at least one of 'em's sober.
Togruta: Togruta. Pack hunters with eyes everywhere. Ahsoka showed the galaxy your kind don't quit easy.
Togorian: Togorian. Claws out, temper short, and subtlety spaced out an airlock years ago.
Toydarian: Toydarian. Force tricks slide right off you. Watto proved even Jedi can't cheat a proper cheat.
Trandoshan: Trandoshan. Hunters who don't stay dead and never stop keepin' score. Wookiees remember every kriffin' bit of it.
Trianii: Trianii. Proud hunters measure life in trophies. Just don't start countin' my crew.
Twi'lek: A Twi'lek. Slaved, scorned, rebelled, and still standin'. Galaxy keeps tryin' to break you and keeps failin'.
Ubese: Ubese. Masked mercs with no past and worse futures. If I see your face, somethin's gone wrong.
Utai: Utai. Tunnel dwellers with patience carved from stone. You'll outwait storms and grudges alike.
Vahla: Vahla. Dark whispers in the blood. Sith never really let go of their leftovers.
Vurk: Vurk. Jungle warriors with arms like batterin' rams. Swamps feel safer with you than cities do.
Weequay: Weequay. Scarred sailors and pirates alike. Hondo Ohnaka didn't exactly polish your reputation.
Whiphid: Whiphid. Arctic predators with tempers colder than space. You don't scare easy—and that scares others.
Wookiee: A Wookiee! Loyal as a bonded hull plate and twice as dangerous when crossed. Chewbacca taught the galaxy not to test that.
Wroonian: Wroonian. Long limbs, longer reach. You grab things others can't—and sometimes shouldn't.
Yarkora: Yarkora. Built for war, raised in it. Peace probably feels like a trap.
Yevetha: Yevetha. Militaristic, bitter, and hard to keep down. Empire learned the hard way you don't stay conquered.
Yuuzhan Vong: Yuuzhan Vong… no droids, no mercy, no kriffin' compromise. Galaxy still limps from your visit.
Yuzzem: Yuzzem. Loud rage, louder roars. I can hear you thinkin' from the next bulkhead.
Zabrak: Zabrak. Pain's an old friend and fear's an old enemy. Darth Maul made damn sure no one forgets that.
Zeltron: Zeltron. Charm flows like bad spice wine. By the time folk realize, they're already ruined.
Zygerrian: Zygerrian. Slavers with long memories and shorter lifespans these days. Galaxy's done bein' patient.
